verses.verse: Jude, <S%G2455><s%> a bond-servant of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and brother <S%G80><s%> of James, <S%G2385><s%> to those <S%G3588><s%> who are the called, <S%G2822><s%> beloved <S%G25><s%> in God <S%G2316><s%> the Father, <S%G3962><s%> and kept <S%G5083><s%> for Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ: <S%G5547><s%>
May mercy <S%G1656><s%> and peace <S%G1515><s%> and love <S%G26><s%> be multiplied <S%G4129><s%> to you.

Beloved, <S%G27><s%> while I was making <S%G4160><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> effort <S%G4710><s%> to write <S%G1125><s%> you about <S%G4012><s%> our common <S%G2839><s%> salvation, <S%G4991><s%> I felt <S%G2192><s%> the necessity <S%G318><s%> to write <S%G1125><s%> to you appealing <S%G3870><s%> that you contend <S%G1864><s%> earnestly <S%G1864><s%> for the faith <S%G4102><s%> which was once <S%G530><s%> for all <S%G530><s%> delivered <S%G3860><s%> to the saints. <S%G40><s%>

For certain <S%G5100><s%> persons <S%G444><s%> have crept <S%G3921><s%> in unnoticed, <S%G3921><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who were long <S%G3819><s%> beforehand <S%G4270><s%> marked <S%G4270><s%> out for this <S%G3778><s%> condemnation, <S%G2917><s%> ungodly <S%G765><s%> persons <S%G765><s%> who turn <S%G3346><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of our God <S%G2316><s%> into licentiousness <S%G766><s%> and deny <S%G720><s%> our only <S%G3441><s%> Master <S%G1203><s%> and Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> I desire <S%G1014><s%> to remind <S%G5279><s%> you, though you know <S%G3609><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> once <S%G530><s%> for all, <S%G530><s%> that the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> after saving <S%G4982><s%> a people <S%G2992><s%> out of the land <S%G1093><s%> of Egypt, <S%G125><s%> subsequently <S%G1208><s%> destroyed <S%G622><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who did not believe. <S%G4100><s%>

And angels <S%G32><s%> who did not keep <S%G5083><s%> their own <S%G1438><s%> domain, <S%G746><s%> but abandoned <S%G620><s%> their proper <S%G2398><s%> abode, <S%G3613><s%> He has kept <S%G5083><s%> in eternal <S%G126><s%> bonds <S%G1199><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> darkness <S%G2217><s%> for the judgment <S%G2920><s%> of the great <S%G3173><s%> day. <S%G2250><s%>

Just <S%G5613><s%> as Sodom <S%G4670><s%> and Gomorrah <S%G1116><s%> and the cities <S%G4172><s%> around <S%G4012><s%> them, since they in the same <S%G3664><s%> way <S%G5158><s%> as these <S%G3778><s%> indulged <S%G1608><s%> in gross <S%G1608><s%> immorality <S%G1608><s%> and went <S%G565><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> strange <S%G2087><s%> flesh, <S%G4561><s%> are exhibited <S%G4295><s%> as an example, <S%G1164><s%> in undergoing <S%G5254><s%> the punishment <S%G1349><s%> of eternal <S%G166><s%> fire. <S%G4442><s%>

Yet <S%G3305><s%> in the same <S%G3668><s%> manner <S%G3668><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> men, <S%G3778><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> by dreaming, <S%G1797><s%> defile <S%G3392><s%> the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> and reject <S%G114><s%> authority, <S%G2963><s%> and revile <S%G987><s%> angelic majesties. <S%G1391><s%>

But Michael <S%G3413><s%> the archangel, <S%G743><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> he disputed <S%G1252><s%> with the devil <S%G1228><s%> and argued <S%G1256><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%> of Moses, <S%G3475><s%> did not dare <S%G5111><s%> pronounce <S%G2018><s%> against <S%G2018><s%> him a railing <S%G988><s%> judgment, <S%G2920><s%> but said, <S%G3004><s%> "The Lord <S%G2962><s%> rebuke <S%G2008><s%> you."

But these <S%G3778><s%> men <S%G3778><s%> revile <S%G987><s%> the things which <S%G3745><s%> they do not understand; <S%G3609><s%> and the things which <S%G3745><s%> they know <S%G1987><s%> by instinct, <S%G5447><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> unreasoning <S%G249><s%> animals, <S%G2226><s%> by these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> they are destroyed. <S%G5351><s%>

Woe <S%G3759><s%> to them! For they have gone <S%G4198><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%> of Cain, <S%G2535><s%> and for pay <S%G3408><s%> they have rushed <S%G7062><s%> headlong <S%G7062><s%> into the error <S%G4106><s%> of Balaam, <S%G903><s%> and perished <S%G622><s%> in the rebellion <S%G485><s%> of Korah. <S%G2879><s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> men <S%G3778><s%> are those <S%G3588><s%> who are hidden <S%G4694><s%> reefs <S%G4694><s%> in your love <S%G26><s%> feasts <S%G26><s%> when they feast <S%G4910><s%> with you without <S%G870><s%> fear, <S%G870><s%> caring <S%G4165><s%> for themselves; <S%G1438><s%> clouds <S%G3507><s%> without <S%G504><s%> water, <S%G504><s%> carried <S%G3911><s%> along <S%G3911><s%> by winds; <S%G417><s%> autumn <S%G5352><s%> trees <S%G1186><s%> without <S%G175><s%> fruit, <S%G175><s%> doubly <S%G1364><s%> dead, <S%G599><s%> uprooted; <S%G1610><s%>

wild <S%G66><s%> waves <S%G2949><s%> of the sea, <S%G2281><s%> casting <S%G1890><s%> up their own <S%G1438><s%> shame <S%G152><s%> like <S%G1890><s%> foam; <S%G1890><s%> wandering <S%G4107><s%> stars, <S%G792><s%> for whom <S%G3739><s%> the black <S%G2217><s%> darkness <S%G4655><s%> has been reserved <S%G5083><s%> forever. <S%G165><s%>

And about these <S%G3778><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> Enoch, <S%G1802><s%> [in] the seventh <S%G1442><s%> [generation] from Adam, <S%G76><s%> prophesied, <S%G4395><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Behold, <S%G2400><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> with many <S%G3461><s%> thousands <S%G3461><s%> of His holy <S%G40><s%> ones, <S%G40><s%>

to execute <S%G4160><s%> judgment <S%G2920><s%> upon all, <S%G3956><s%> and to convict <S%G1651><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the ungodly <S%G765><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> their ungodly <S%G763><s%> deeds <S%G2041><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> they have done <S%G764><s%> in an ungodly <S%G764><s%> way, <S%G764><s%> and of all <S%G3956><s%> the harsh <S%G4642><s%> things <S%G4642><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> ungodly <S%G763><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%> have spoken <S%G2980><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> Him. "

These <S%G3778><s%> are grumblers, <S%G1113><s%> finding <S%G3202><s%> fault, <S%G3202><s%> following <S%G4198><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> their [own] lusts; <S%G1939><s%> they speak <S%G2980><s%> arrogantly, <S%G5246><s%> flattering <S%G2296><s%> people <S%G4383><s%> for the sake <S%G5484><s%> of [gaining an] advantage. <S%G5622><s%>

But you, beloved, <S%G27><s%> ought to remember <S%G3403><s%> the words <S%G4487><s%> that were spoken <S%G4275><s%> beforehand <S%G4275><s%> by the apostles <S%G652><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%>

that they were saying <S%G3004><s%> to you, "In the last <S%G2078><s%> time <S%G5550><s%> there shall be mockers, <S%G1703><s%> following <S%G4198><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> their own <S%G1438><s%> ungodly <S%G763><s%> lusts. <S%G1939><s%>"
These <S%G3778><s%> are the ones who cause <S%G592><s%> divisions, <S%G592><s%> worldly-minded, devoid <S%G3361><s%> <S%G2192><s%> of the Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>

But you, beloved, <S%G27><s%> building <S%G2026><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> up on your most <S%G40><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> faith; <S%G4102><s%> praying <S%G4336><s%> in the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit; <S%G4151><s%>

keep <S%G5083><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> in the love <S%G26><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> waiting <S%G4327><s%> anxiously <S%G4327><s%> for the mercy <S%G1656><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> to eternal <S%G166><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>
And have <S%G1653><s%> mercy <S%G1653><s%> on some, <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3303><s%> who are doubting; <S%G1252><s%>

save <S%G4982><s%> others, snatching <S%G726><s%> them out of the fire; <S%G4442><s%> and on some <S%G3739><s%> have <S%G1653><s%> mercy <S%G1653><s%> with fear, <S%G5401><s%> hating <S%G3404><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> the garment <S%G5509><s%> polluted <S%G4695><s%> by the flesh. <S%G4561><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> to Him who is able <S%G1410><s%> to keep <S%G5442><s%> you from stumbling, <S%G679><s%> and to make <S%G2476><s%> you stand <S%G2476><s%> in the presence <S%G2714><s%> of His glory <S%G1391><s%> blameless <S%G299><s%> with great <S%G20><s%> joy, <S%G20><s%>

to the only <S%G3441><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> our Savior, <S%G4990><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> our Lord, <S%G2962><s%> [be] glory, <S%G1391><s%> majesty, <S%G3172><s%> dominion <S%G2904><s%> and authority, <S%G1849><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> time <S%G165><s%> and now <S%G3568><s%> and forever. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
